text: Kościelec is a village in the administrative district of Gmina Krotoszyce, within Legnica County, Lower Silesian Voivodeship, in south-western Poland. Prior to 1945 it was in Germany. It lies approximately south of Legnica, and west of the regional capital Wrocław. The village has a population of 340. ==References== Category:Villages in Legnica County
title: Kościelec, Lower Silesian Voivodeship
